duration.comment: Movement duration, Zero is the end of simulation (def=0)

depth.comment: Water depth. It is necessary for drift correction (def=0)

swl.comment: Still water level (free-surface). It is necessary for drift correction (def=0)

filesvel.comment: Main name of files with velocity to use

filesvelx.comment: First file and count to use

usevelz.comment: Use velocity in Z or not (def=false)

movedata.comment: Movement of data in CSV files

dpz.comment: Distance between key points in Z (def=2)

coefdt.comment: Multiplies by dt value in the calculation (using 0 is not applied) (default=1000)

function.comment: Coefficients in function for velocity (def. psi=0.9, beta=1)

driftcorrection.comment: Coefficient of drift correction applied in velocity X. 0:Disabled, 1:Full correction (def=0)

driftinitialramp.comment: Ignore waves from external data in initial seconds (def=0)
